sentences.sContent: The team made an enormous effort.
sentences.sCn: 该队付出了巨大的努力。

sentences.sContent: ...the big benefit will not only be in the housing of this enormous and rapidly growing amount of data...
...Antarctica has enormous reserves of oil and natural gas...
...there is reason to continue to use and develop them to help meet the enormous challenge of Sustainably feeding a growing planet...
...The overwhelming conclusion when you put this enormous literature together is that there is no clear academic advantage of sitting in all-female or all-male classes...
...the process of urbanization will only accelerate in the decades to come — with an enormous impact on biodiversity and potentially on climate change...
...The reason behind this phenomenon is common — the enormous pressure of finding a job...
...There’s an enormous gap between the rich and the poor in this country...

synos.tran: 庞大的，巨大的；凶暴的，极恶的

remMethod.val: e(出) ＋ norm(规范) ＋ ous(…的) → 超出规范的 → 巨大的

words.tran: 巨大地，庞大地；非常地，在极大程度上

trans.tranOther: very big in size or in amount
